Description:
Hotel "Vilnis" is a 3-star hotel on the right bank of the Venta alongside business center and commercial port. The hotel is located less than 4 km from the center of city, where you can get in 10 minutes by car, 30 minutes by bicycle on the cycle path or by city bus from the hotel. The Vilnis is a pleasant hotel in the north of Ventspils, on the right side of Venta River, next to the business centre and commercial port, 4 km away from the centre. Free parking is available at the property.

Rooms at the hotel are equipped with a TV and bathroom with a shower. Free WiFi is featured. Please inform Hotel Vilnis in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.

Description:
In a quiet location on the edge of the city, directly opposite the sea port, the hotel is a convenient base for exploring all that this city has to offer. The very centre of Ventspils is just 3 km away, and there is a regular bus service from the stop right outside the hotel to the city centre (10 minutes ride).

The staff of this establishment offer a warm, traditional Latvian welcome in the lobby, which features 24-hour reception and check-out service and a hotel safe. The hotel also has a restaurant-bar, café, conference facilities, WLAN Internet access and room and laundry services. There is a private car park on site for guests' use.

The rooms each come equipped with shower/WC, satellite/cable TV, fridge and WLAN Internet access. The colours in the rooms are bright, lending them a warm atmosphere and peacefulness. Further in-room amenities include hairdryer, double bed, safe, kitchenette, tea and coffee making facilities and washing machine. The air conditioning is individually regulated.

The hotel has a sauna for a little rest after an exhausting workday.

The hotel's restaurant-bar offers extensive regional specialties and classic international favourites for banquets and dinners. A continental breakfast buffet is served daily, whilst lunch and dinner are offered as set menus.
